lead_paragraph: Italian police seized assets on Tuesday from football players, their agents and club executives as part of an investigation  into alleged tax evasion in the country's top two divisions.

headline.print_headline: Italian Police Investigate Football Clubs Over Alleged Tax Evasion
headline.main: Italian Police Investigate Football Clubs Over Alleged Tax Evasion
